channel.title: Allowing any client?
channel.description: Currently, only the official client is allowed on a source I downloaded, but I want to make it so any client can be used and when the person logs in it just says "You are not using the official client" and give them a download link. How can I do this?

item.title: Allowing any client?
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:

Currently, only the official client is allowed on a source I downloaded, but I want to make it so any client can be used and when the person logs in it just says “You are not using the official client” and give them a download link. How can I do this?

Read full topic
